amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to alleviate the costs tribes incur due to the expansion of criminal jurisdiction. Further this amendment provides language allowing the Attorney General to award grants to tribes to improve law enforcement, tribal court personnel and criminal codes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A013) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Grijalva amendment (A013) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A013) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
